description: Searches for a specified string in a file and replaces it with a new string. Use with caution.

args.name: workingDirectory
args.description: The absolute path to the current working directory.

args.name: filePath
args.description: The relative path of the file in which we'll search and replace.

args.name: searchQuery
args.description: The string we're looking for in the file.

args.name: replacementString
args.description: The string that will replace the searchQuery in the file.

responses.description: Search and replace operation completed successfully
